extendedInfo.description: (Please uninstall and reinstall if you have problems with update. Progress is saved on SD card. Thanks!)Legend holds that the great treasure of Atlantis was hidden just before the city was destroyed. A single key was created to reveal the treasure's location only if the bearer proved worthy. This cube is believed to be that key. Do you have what it takes to unlock it?Welcome to the Cube of Atlantis, a puzzle game like no other!Test the limits of your ingenuity, patience, and determination as you try to unlock the mystery of this ancient artifact. The Cube will take you on a journey through multiple puzzles as you try to decipher its secret.[Free trial version!  More levels and features available in the Full Version!]Features:Â» Fully interactive 3D cube - touch it, spin it, lick it. Whatever it takes to solve itÂ» Original sound effectsÂ» 20 Levels progressing from easy to way-too-hard (many more levels in Full Version)Â» Multiple user support: let your friends play with their own username so they don't mess up your progressÂ» Helpful Hints: enable this to see hints when you get stuck. Disable hints if you are a puzzle masterÂ» Stars: Perform each level flawlessly with as few moves as possible to earn up to 3 stars.  Collect more stars to unlock additional levelsÂ» Trophies: Special hidden puzzles in some levels.  Solve them in a special/different/unique way to earn a trophyÂ» Visual Sound Effects: Turn on special flashes of colored light to represent key sounds in the game.  Makes play possible when phone is on mute or you can't hear in noisy environments.Now, a warning: the first few levels may be easy. But it won't be long before the Cube starts trying your patience, resolve, and sanity. There are no rules, only a lost treasure that needs to be illuminated by your brainpower!When you encounter a seemingly impossible level and experience frustration, remember you're accessing the Cube through an expensive phone. No puzzle will require you to throw it against a wall! THE CREATORS OF CUBE OF ATLANTIS CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE CAUSED TO YOUR PHONE/DEVICE OUT OF FRUSTRATION! :)You have been warned. Now, solve the Cube of Atlantis!Description of Permissions:Â» Internet Access is used for ads (removed in Full Version), and reporting completely anonymous usage statistics, such as the time it takes to complete each level and how many times each level is attempted. With this data, we will improve the game to make sure it's not too hard and not too easy.Â» Record Audio is used to access the microphone on higher levels in the full version.  As advertised, the Cube is fully interactive![Please help us improve the game!  If you have any issues, bug reports, feature requests, or level ideas, just email us.  Thanks!  cubeofatlantis@dangermonkeys.com]

reviews.title: Level 13
reviews.comment: I figured out level 13 \"Addendum\" Even checked the internet to see if I got the solution right. I kept on matching it and matching it, but it wouldn\'t let me pass the level. I started counting, I counted 70 matches before losing count. 70? You\'ve got to be kidding me. Surely something like 20 would be more than enough. I\'m sorry, but I can\'t spend hours on a level I\'ve already figured out. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very nice puzzle game
reviews.comment: It is one of the best puzzle game I have ever played. First six levels are easy to solve, but I am stuck in tone puzzle.Can\'t wait to get full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC EVO 4G NO-GO
reviews.comment: My phone works well, so I tried the cube even though other EVO 4G users had bad luck.  I played two levels before mine locked up & I had to pull the battery.  Too bad because I like the progressive sequence type of puzzle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forces screen to maximum brightness
reviews.comment: No thanks, I have my screen set the way it is for a reason and I don\'t need you over-riding my settings and then not giving me any controls to set it back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It gives u the pure satisfaction when u able to solve a puzzle without the hints! A great game indeed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: None
reviews.comment: Would be better if I didn\'t have to pull my battery every time I turn it on. Other than that, decent game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game gets one star for being an awesome puzzle game I can\'t use because it contains a virus that locks my phone forcing me to pull the battery!@#
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very simple yet innovative and challenging puzzle game. Played it on a Xoom tablet and will probably get full version. More games like this please! Great brain workout.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless cheats
reviews.comment: I used all 20 something cheats online and still can\'t figure out foreign language. In addition the puzzles are pretty stupid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good & Bad
reviews.comment: Was a really fun game til it crashed my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had to pull my battery...
reviews.comment: Seems like an interesting game concept with great graphics but it locked up my Nexus One. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very innovative and quite challenging! Completed trial fairly quickly, but it was really fun. Look forward to playing the full game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This game is fun no problems with it freezing up on me the only problem I\'m having is drawing the x for that level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What an amazing game. Cant believe this is all based around a cube.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I  love  games that challenge my mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool but it crashed. Had to reboot my Evo. Done with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recent ratings about record audio permission:
reviews.comment: Didn\'t want to spoil puzzle: permission\'s to access the microphone to respond to sound (Now explained in description. May need to clear cache to see)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finished finally.
reviews.comment: Nice game, good graphic. Too bad can\'t play full version free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nemesis Factor
reviews.comment: In the spirit of the game nemesis factor. Some puzzles are easy, some diabolical!
